amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 116-6 to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to conduct a feasibility study to determine how the Department of Veterans Affairs could provide child care assistance for veterans who receive covered health care services from non-Department facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cisneros amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Cisneros.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cisneros amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
